title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Bungie’s ‘Marathon’ Plagiarism Scandal Comes To A ‘Satisfactory’ End
items.description: The Marathon plagiarism scandal is over after Bungie and the artist in question have come to terms. But there's lasting damage all the same.

items.title: ‘Destiny 2: Renegades’ Arrives With A Hilariously Broken Build
items.description: Destiny 2 Renegades is here, and with it comes one of the strongest enemy clearing builds in the entire game, and it's so easy.

items.title: The Amazon: Both Forest And River Are Critical To Climate Solutions

items.title: Ferrari Shares Stall; Is Porsche EV Failure Spooking Investors?
items.description: Echoes from the Porsche EV debacle could be spooking Ferrari shareholders, as it prepares its own EV. Ferrari’s shares are wallowing at year lows, awa...

items.title: iOS 26.2 Release Date: Millions Of iPhone Users Must Upgrade From iOS 18, Report Says
items.description: Until now, iPhone users have been able to choose between staying on iOS 18 and jumping to iOS 26. That option is about to vanish.
